panels.description: Will give an error if more than "All" or no asset is selected.

targets.query:
edge_data
| where AssetID == $AssetID
| extend sourcetimestamp = todatetime(Timestamp)
| where $__timeFilter(sourcetimestamp)
| summarize VibrationAnomolyMetric = avg(VibrationAnomalyFactor) by bin(sourcetimestamp, 10s)
| project sourcetimestamp, VibrationAnomolyMetric

edge_data
| where AssetID == $AssetID
| extend sourcetimestamp = todatetime(Timestamp)
| where $__timeFilter(sourcetimestamp)
| summarize TemperatureAnomalyMetric = avg(TemperatureAnomalyFactor) by bin(sourcetimestamp, 10s)
| project sourcetimestamp, TemperatureAnomalyMetric

edge_data
| where AssetID == $AssetID
| extend sourcetimestamp = todatetime(Timestamp)
| where $__timeFilter(sourcetimestamp)
| summarize HumidityAnomalyMetric = avg(HumidityAnomalyFactor) by bin(sourcetimestamp, 10s)
| project sourcetimestamp, HumidityAnomalyMetric

panels.title: Anomalies (selected asset)

panels.description: Asset that should be the target of Predictive Maintenace crew.

targets.query:
edge_data
| extend sourcetimestamp = todatetime(Timestamp)
| where $__timeFilter(sourcetimestamp)
| summarize TotalCount = count(), AnomalyCount = countif(VibrationAnomaly == true) by AssetID
| extend AnomalyPercentage = todouble(AnomalyCount) / todouble(TotalCount) * 100
| top 1 by AnomalyPercentage desc
| project AssetID

panels.title: Asset with most Vibration Anomalies

targets.query:
edge_data
| where AssetID == $AssetID
| extend sourcetimestamp = todatetime(Timestamp)
| where $__timeFilter(sourcetimestamp)
| where HumidityAnomaly == true or TemperatureAnomaly == true or VibrationAnomaly == true
| summarize CountOfAnomalies = count()

edge_data
| where AssetID == $AssetID
| extend sourcetimestamp = todatetime(Timestamp)
| where $__timeFilter(sourcetimestamp)
| summarize Anomalies = countif(HumidityAnomaly == true or TemperatureAnomaly == true or VibrationAnomaly == true),
            NoAnomalies = countif(HumidityAnomaly == false and TemperatureAnomaly == false and VibrationAnomaly == false)

panels.description: Will give an error if more than 1 asset is selected.

targets.query:
edge_data
| where AssetID == $AssetID
| extend sourcetimestamp = todatetime(Timestamp)
| where $__timeFilter(sourcetimestamp)
| project sourcetimestamp, Vibration
| summarize avg(Vibration) by bin(sourcetimestamp, 10s)

edge_data
| where AssetID == $AssetID
| extend sourcetimestamp = todatetime(Timestamp)
| where $__timeFilter(sourcetimestamp)
| project sourcetimestamp, Temperature
| summarize avg(Temperature) by bin(sourcetimestamp, 10s)

edge_data
| where AssetID == $AssetID
| extend sourcetimestamp = todatetime(Timestamp)
| where $__timeFilter(sourcetimestamp)
| project sourcetimestamp, Humidity
| summarize avg(Humidity) by bin(sourcetimestamp, 10s)
